titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Select Committee on Intelligence.

calendar.text: Committee on Intelligence ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on Intelligence. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Roberts. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary: 1/31/2005--Reported to Senate without amendment. Authorizes expenditures by the Select Committee on Intelligence for the 109th Congress.
